turkish_example_sentence: Onlar asla bu garip bilimsel teoriyi düşünmeyeceklerdi ama meraklı oldular.
english_example_sentence: They were never going to think about this strange scientific theory but they became curious.
russian_example_sentence: Они никогда не собирались думать об этой странной научной теории, но стали любопытны.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Onlar asla bu garip bilimsel teoriyi ______ ama meraklı oldular.
